actions.text: Amendment SA 2005 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 2005 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S13366; text: CR S13366) To increase the maximum rate of post differentials and danger pay allowances for civilian employees of the United States Agency for International Development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2005 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2005 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lugar.

purpose: To increase the maximum rate of post differentials and danger pay allowances for civilian employees of the United States Agency for International Development.
